summary: This bill, the Town of North Topsail Beach Coastal Barrier Resources System Map Amendment Act of 2025, aims to revise the boundaries of a unit of the John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System in Topsail, North Carolina. It directs the Secretary of the Interior to exclude certain parcels in North Topsail Beach from the system based on local zoning ordinances. Specifically, parcels zoned for non-conservation purposes will be excluded, effectively altering the areas subject to coastal barrier regulations. The Act references a specific map and clarifies the scope of the correction.
